data.title: Vail Resorts, Inc.
data.meta_description: Vail Resorts, Inc. is the premier mountain resort company in the world and a leader in luxury, destination-based travel at iconic locations.
data.text:
Our growing portfolio of owned and operated resorts.

Award-Winning Leadership

Most Innovative Company

We are proud to be named to Fast Company’s list of Most Innovative Companies of 2024 “for launching a first-of-its-kind ski gear membership program” – My Epic Gear. This honor is a testament to our culture of leadership and service.

Most Trustworthy Company

For the second consecutive year, we have been named by Newsweek as one of the 2024 Most Trustworthy Companies in America. This recognition follows an independent survey and measures customer, investor, and employee trust.

Best Mid-Size Company

Our company’s continued investment in the employee experience, as well as our Commitment to Zero achievements, placed us at 208 out of 500 companies on this inaugural list.

ENDLESS EXPERIENCES ON ONE PASS​

Whether our guests want to ski and ride one day or every day, close to home or at world-class destinations, our Epic Passes provide unmatched value, flexibility, and access.

Our mission is to create the Experience of a Lifetime for our employees, so they can, in turn, create the Experience of a Lifetime for our guests.​

Guest EXPERIENCE

Team

Our team members do not work for Vail Resorts, they are Vail Resorts. We know an investment in them is a direct investment in the guest experience. ​

On-Mountain Investments

To improve the guest experience, we have invested over $2.2 billion in the past 15 years. New lifts, new terrain and state-of-the-art facilities help our guests make the most of their day on mountain. ​

Technology

We believe that digital innovation, more than ever, will be key for delivering a great guest experience on-mountain. Read about the latest innovations we’re pioneering for the industry. ​

We take climate change seriously and are on track to reach a zero net operating footprint by 2030 across all 41 of our mountain resorts. Commitment to Zero means: zero net emissions, zero waste to landfill, and zero net operating impact on forests and habitat. ​

​We are dedicated to helping our mountain resort communities thrive through direct engagement and grants, and by providing support on shared priorities: affordable housing, mental health, and more.

We are committed to removing barriers to entry and creating a more inclusive sport through our programs for youth, people living with disability, and populations that have historically been underrepresented in the snow sports industry.

We support our employees with natural disaster and hardship relief grants and scholarships, and provide programs that support our employees through mind, body, and wallet.

What’s new

Vail Resorts Honors Colorado River Day with $1 Million Gift to The Nature Conservancy

Today, Vail Resorts, Inc. pledges $1 million to The Nature Conservancy (TNC), a global environmental nonprofit working to create a world where people and nature can thrive.

National Brotherhood of Snowsports Selects Keystone for Annual Summit

Two years ago, The National Brotherhood of Snowsports celebrated their 50th anniversary at Vail Mountain, and we’re proud to be welcoming NBS back to Colorado in 2025!

Vail Resorts Wins Five National Ski Area Association Awards

Vail Resorts is honored to receive five awards from the National Ski Areas Association (NSAA), the trade association for ski area owners and operators.

Vail Resorts Closes on Acquisition of Crans-Montana Mountain Resort in Switzerland

Vail Resorts, Inc. closed on its purchase of Crans-Montana Mountain Resort, a renowned destination ski resort with a steep history as an outdoor sports haven in Switzerland and around the world.

Vail Resorts named one of the World’s Most Innovative Companies by Fast Company

Recognized for our legacy of innovation and reimagining the guest experience with My Epic Gear.

Vail Resorts One of the Most Trustworthy Companies in America

We’re honored to be recognized by Newsweek as one of the 2024 Most Trustworthy Companies in America.

Vail Resorts Launches My Epic Gear Membership for 2024/25 Season

The new ultimate gear membership that gives skiers and riders all the benefits of gear ownership, but with more choice, lower cost and no hassle.

Introducing My Epic Assistant

My Epic Assistant provides resort information to guests in real-time, at their fingertips.

Epic Passes Now on Sale for the 2024/25 Winter Season

The best time to plan your winter at world-class destinations is when the snow is still falling this winter.

Reggie Chambers Appointed to Vail Resorts Board of Directors

Reggie Chambers is an executive vice president and the chief transformation officer for TIAA, and has been appointed to Vail Resort’s Board of Directors.

Vail Resorts Achieves 100% Renewable Electricity for Second Consecutive Year & Achieves 2030 Energy-Efficiency Goal Early

Our new 22/23 Environmental & Social Responsibility report is now live. Read to learn how we’re on track to reach our goals.
